meanings.definition: A disease caused by a parasite transmitted by mosquitoes.
meanings.sent1: Many people in the village suffered from malarias last summer.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with malarias after conducting blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined when the unexpected guest, malarias, decided to join in.
meanings.sent4: The spread of malarias in the community was like a dark cloud looming over their heads.
meanings.sent5: The fear of malarias lingered in the air, making everyone cautious of mosquito bites.

meanings.sent1: The malarias cases in the region increased significantly this year.
meanings.sent2: She studied the different strains of malarias found in various countries.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with excitement when the teacher announced a project on malarias.
meanings.sent4: The malarias on the map indicated the areas with high mosquito activity.
meanings.sent5: The researchers collected data on malarias outbreaks to analyze patterns and trends.
